In Julia, Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

Here is the solution:

```julia
function wrap_string(s::String, text_width::Int = 10)
    words = split(s, ' ')
    result = ""
    for word in words
        if length(result) + length(word) > text_width
            result *= "\n"
        end
        result *= "$word "
    end
    return result
end
```

Example:

```julia
println(wrap_string("Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.", 20))
```
